com.ibm.itim.apps.policy.ProvisioningPolicy

Packages that use ProvisioningPolicy
com.ibm.itim.apps.policy Extends the com.ibm.itim.apps package to provide a remotable application programming interface for Policy management. 
 

Uses of ProvisioningPolicy in com.ibm.itim.apps.policy
 

Methods in com.ibm.itim.apps.policy that return ProvisioningPolicy
 ProvisioningPolicy ProvisioningPolicyMO.getData()
          Returns a current snapshot of the data defining the managed object.
 

Methods in com.ibm.itim.apps.policy that return types with arguments of type ProvisioningPolicy

          Returns the provisioning policies(s) that the specified role and any role ancestors are using.
 

Methods in com.ibm.itim.apps.policy with parameters of type ProvisioningPolicy

          Creates a provisioning policy in the provisioning platform with the specified attributes within the given container.
 Request ProvisioningPolicyManager.modifyPolicy(OrganizationalContainerMO container, ProvisioningPolicy subject, java.util.Date scheduleTime)
